page.title: 07Local News,Rivenhall
page.content: Local news for Rivenhall village for one week beginning 7th July 1985 {Sunday:}The cubs and scouts held their annual strawberry fayre. {Monday:}The local secondary school began its activities week.All lessons were suspended while the children took part in a wide range of sporting and outdoor activities. {Tuesday:}The local schools held a rounders rally. {Wednesday:}The funeral of the assistant parish priest was held.{ {Thursday:}The pupils from the secondary school entertained the pupils from Rivenhall school with music and singing. {Friday:}Nothing eventful happened. {Saturday:}The Gardening club held its annual summer show.
